Html:
Hi,

In making a custom healthcheck rule, there is the rule HealthCheckConfigBase. However, I can't find this (rather, vs2010 intellisense does not detect it with the references added to my project).

 

Can anyone assist?

Hi, sorry for the delay in replying - I'm in the UK so probably a different timezone to you!

Ah, the docs are wrong - HealthCheckConfigBase doesn't exist so that is why you can't find it!

The best base classes to use are:

  • For a configuration class: PluginConfigBase, namespace Wolfpack.Core.Interfaces.Entities
  • For a HealthCheck: HealthCheckBase<T> (where T is your Config class), namespace Wolfpack.Core.Checks

I will update the docs ASAP - any more questions or help then just drop a message here.

Cheers,

James
